abstract: Deutsche Telekom said that it would change some terms and let the handset operate on rival networks.
snippet: Deutsche Telekom said that it would change some terms and let the handset operate on rival networks.
lead_paragraph: Deutsche Telekom, whose exclusive rights for the Apple iPhone in Germany are contested by the Vodafone Group, said yesterday that it would change some terms and let the handset operate on rival networks.

headline.main: Deutsche Telekom Will Let Rivals Operate iPhones
headline.print_headline: Deutsche Telekom Will Let Rivals Operate iPhones
